name: Color Block Green Mint silky infinity Scarf
description:
This is a soft, silky, lightweight and extra chunky scarf to bring your spring mood on! Wear it in a long loop, or wrap it twice for a chunky look. Great complement to any outfit this season!

S I Z E 
Length 62” (circle) (all edges have been sewn for a professional clean finish)
Width 32” 

C O L O R S
Mint green/teal 
Orange
Antique/Saffron

Material: gauze
Recommended Care: Hand wash or spot clean and lay flat to dry.

name: Infinity Loop Scarf for Girls - Holiday Gifts
description:
Our best selling chevron scarf now for your little one! We make them in 4 colors.

This is a soft, lightweight infinity scarf for your little one. We made them wide enough that they fit easily.

Wrap them twice for a chunky look. Great complement to any outfit this season and to keep them warm over the holidays!

S I Z E
Length 50” (127 cm) (circle)
Width 20” (50.8 cm)

Model measures 34" tall (86.4 cm tall)

name: MOCHA BROWN CHUNKY CABLE KNIT INFINITY SCARF - COSY UP SCARF
description:
Amazingly cozy-soft and chunky cable knit infinity scarf in mocha/brown with a lurex accent. Wear it in a long loop, or wrap it twice for a chunky look. This scarf is to keep warm while elegant and chic during the holidays!
I am making these in Rose, Ivory and Black as well (select dropdown menu to choose another color).  
 

MEASUREMENTS
Closed 72" circumference
Width 20"

Hand or machine wash on delicate, hang dry

Thanks for shopping!

Have any questions? Contact me: rosa@lepetitmonkey.com

name: Vintage American 4th of July Flag infinity Scarf
description:
Exclusive Le Petit Monkey Vintage American flag infinity scarf.

Patriotic July 4th Vintage American Scarf. We have made our favorite now in infinity version!

This silky, lightweight scarf with 68" in circumference and 38" wide  is perfect for your 4th of July or any day!

Wear it in a long loop, or wrap it twice for a chunky look. Great complement to any outfit this season!


Recommended Care: Hand wash or spot clean and lay flat to dry.

name: CROCHET CHOKER in several colors with cute crochet Ladybug
description:
We just finished our new line of Super cute and trendy crochet chokers. 

This line of products was designed with you, beautiful Moms and Girls, in mind. 

Comes with a button to close it in the back.

Pick your color. We make them in a variety of them (green, blue, red, grey, mint green, purple, pink and burgundy).


Dimensions: Is one size fits most. Fastens with a button (see picture 2)
Length: 13 inches
Width: 1.5 inches

Makes a GREAT GIFT FOR NEW MOMS and Baby Showers and it is ready to ship. 

Materials: Bambool yarn with a beautiful stretch. (Bambool is a slinky blend of merino wool and bamboo. 80% bamboo, 20% viscose merino wool).

Happy shopping!
Rosa

name: CROCHET HEADBAND EARWARMER
description:
Super cute headbands perfect for girls and teens. Will keep warm during cold weather and as Christmas gifts. 

They fit over or under the hair with a snug fit so they're sure to stay in place. They fasten with a button on the bottom and have a trendy flower attached on the top.

name: KNIT COWL neck scarf with crochet Butterfly
description:
Hand Knitted stylish cowl neck scarf decorated with a cute crochet  butterfly  and fastened with 3 wooden buttons that close in an exclusive diagonal pattern. This is one of a kind made with a warm merino yarn. Is a prefect unique Gift for the Holiday season. 

♥♥ Measurements:
Length : 24 inches 
Width : 8 inches 

Hand wash only, please, in cool water and mild detergent. Lay flat to dry.
Don't bleach, don't tumble dry and no ironing!

Keep warm in style this winter!

Makes a great gift and is ready to ship!

name: KNITTED CROCHET HEADBAND
description:
Very stylish and adorable handmade crochet headband with a beautiful purple flower. Perfect for a Mom and daughter team. 

One size will fit most. 
Materials: Acrylic yarn with a beautiful stretch. 
Measures: 4.5" wide and 20" long with lots of stretch! 

Care Instructions: It is best to hand wash and lay flat to dry, however it is safe for washing machines with hand wash cycle.


Available colors:
♥ Purple with a cream/white flower
♥ Gray with a purple flower

Be sure to include your color choice when you checkout. You can also send me and email in the message to seller section at checkout.

Looking for other types of headbands?
See other available headbands here:
http://www.lepetitmonkey.com/category/headbands

See other available colors and models for girls under LIttle Girls Accessories: http://www.lepetitmonkey.com/category/little-girls-accessories

Keep warm in style this winter!
Makes a great gift and is ready to ship! 


Happy shopping!
Rosa

http://www.lepetitmonkey.com
